data.title: Obituaries from Wise County TX (1910
data.meta_description: Obituary clippings or text from Wise County newspapers and funeral homes.
data.text:
Wise County Texas Obituaries

Images of Newspaper Clippings and PDFs of

Obituaries & Articles About Deaths

(1800s-2023)

(David Pitts has added many clippings from old newspapers)

Click Here for indexed Names from the old newspapers

Last Names E-G are Below

Most clippings are from 'The Bridgeport Index' and 'The Wise County Messenger', but some local newspapers are not identified.

Some come from other newspapers that David Pitts found as he was researching local families.

Some newer text and PDFs (2000-2023) came from 'The Wise County Messenger' online or

Hawkins Funeral Homes, or Hudson-Torres Family Funeral Home

Click on underlined name to see image of clipping, PDF, or link to page of text (Sheet).

Please report broken links to sue@wisecountytexas.info
